name: UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability
desc: Values that determine where the action can appear in the document browser.

items.name: static var menu: UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability
items.desc: An action that appears in the Edit Menu when the user long presses a supported document.

items.name: static var navigationBar: UIDocumentBrowserAction.Availability
items.desc: An action that appears in the navigation bar when the user puts the document browser in Select mode.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Returns a newly instantiated availability instance.
